column4: ok, im going crazy.  i don't understand HOW you can have NO system tray?  WHERE in the hell do things go when they are minimized?  WHAT is this dark sorcery?
is that you from LMMS land? this is Paul G
the Unity interface minimizes windows to the left icon bar I believe.  But I don't use Unity because I find it awful (although the new HUD is nice)
